title: 0.14.0将会加入物品展示框
author: lzs1234
txt_content:
Item Frames are being added in the upcoming update for Minecraft Pocket 
Edition! Most of you are probably in a high state of anticipation for it’s 
release. Don’t worry, it won’t be long!
物品展示框将会在即将到来的MCPE更新中添加！你们中的多数大概都在高度期待它(0.14.0)的发布。别担心，这不会很久！

WHAT IS AN ITEM FRAME?
Item Frames are an Item in Minecraft Pocket Edition that displays a block or 
item that you place inside of it. It’s primarily a decorative item, and doesn’t 
server another purpose.
什么是物品展示框？
物品展示框是一个能够显示你放在里面的方块或物品的MCPE里的玩意儿。它主要是一个装饰性物品，且不会在服务器里有其它的目的。

WHAT DOES THAT LOOK LIKE?
Here’s a little video tweet of what it looks like:
它将会是怎样的？
这儿是一个关于它的样子的小博客视频
MCPE QUESTION: Who's excited for Item Frames in 0.14.0? RT if you're going to use them! pic.twitter.com/jTvt3f5EcF

— Minecraft PE (@MCPE_News) January 22, 2016 MCPE的问题：谁为0.14.0中物品展示框的到来而兴奋？
如题，如果你将会用它们，pic.twitter.com/jTvt3f5EcF
——Minecraft PE(@MCPE_News)2016年1月22日

The Item Frames will become available to ALL Minecraft PE players, once the 0.14.0 update is available to the public.
当0.14.0更新能够被公众下载时，物品展示框将会能够被所有的玩家取得。
